    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Assets
    Assets handles loading and storing all game images.
    Board
    Represents the game board.
    Direction
    Represents the four cardinal directions on the game board.
    Entity
    Abstract class representing any entity on the board, such as a player or ghost.
    Game
    Main game controller class.
    GameView
    Represents the graphical view of the game.
    Ghost
    Represents a Ghost entity on the board.
    Main
    JavaFX entry point for the Pacman game.
    MenuView
    MenuView handles the game HUD and overlays including: - Score and message display - Start, pause, and end overlays - Level selection and custom level creation
    Player
    Represents the player entity (Pacman) on the board.
    Tiles
    Enum representing different types of tiles on the game board.
